content:
Hi All,
I am using FHIR 3.6.0 DSTU3,in that when i send the DSTU2 Patient resource through the server it is stored. When i tried for the AllergyIntolerance i was unable. Is there any conversion mechanism in that.
Thank You
The STU3 specification includes executable mappings to convert between STU3 and DSTU2 where that's possible, but servers aren't expected to execute them
